set(ICU_I18N_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES
      ../../source/i18n
      ../../source/common
      ../../source/common/include
)

include_directories(${ICU_I18N_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES})
add_library(${ICU_I18N_LIBRARIES} STATIC ${ICU_I18N_SOURCES})
set_target_properties(${ICU_I18N_LIBRARIES} PROPERTIES COMPILE_DEFINITIONS "LIB_ICU_I18N_STATIC")
add_dependencies(${ICU_I18N_LIBRARIES} ${ICU_JAVA_COMMON_LIB})
